tweets.text: An audio tech thread in which I assert 1opine/like til achieving  Brooklyn as a state of mind resulting from no sleep. https://t.co/TbyZG1DdJD
1 Audio Technology will now be abbreviated AT.
2 As a time relative medium audio passes through a collapsed reality that modern hifi systems can't reproduce
3 but old analog systems can because of the time decay of electricity in a vacuum
4 ever we've attempted to hack our brains timing circuits with repetition in the form of organized sound
5 the resulting time distention is what we find pleasurable. the process of listening to the repetition is an additive cognitive void
6 echos of historical impact reverberate through the present forms of AT in a type of feature lock
7 years of autocorrect await those who deny themselves the to opportunity listen to the host DAC
8 the power of rhythm to arrest time perception has been a secret AT of musicians immemorial
9 Spotify is weaponizing AT timebinding at an unprecedented resolution.

10 time in time out is the actual value creation of the AT future. Which is why AI in the field will become so valuable. Zero time time in maximal time out will serve advertisers the highest return on attention. ROT
Audio Technology is a branch of architecture, acoustics.
